item.title: Derby.js - Playing with Models
item.description: Been playing around with Derby in my spare time. The idea behind the platform is smart - using node and express, you write one set of code, and that code automatically syncs data between browsers, servers, and a database. Derby is still raw. The documentation is comprehensive but puts important information about the same topic in different places.
